title: Collaborative Learning-Based Process for Predicting and Enhancing Mathematics Achievement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: A formative assessment-centered course conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and apply problem-solving strategies for mathematics in collaborative learning environments.
Learners can accurately identify individual learning patterns with 80% or higher precision using an LMS-based data tracking system.
Learners can receive and incorporate peer feedback on weekly learning outcomes at least three times to improve performance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
